CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = "IM Payments", (ISBLANK(TRIM(MC_Principal_3_First_Name__c)) = FALSE || ISBLANK(TRIM(MC_Principal_3_Last_Name__c)) = FALSE || MC_Principal_3_Ownership__c >= 0.25), (ISBLANK(TRIM(Account__r.Principal_3_Name__c)) = FALSE || Account__r.Principal_3_Ownership__c >= 0.25))
CustomField.label: TertiaryCondition2
